articles.description: Elevating style to new heights, Air India undergoes a transformation with designer Manish Malhotra at the helm, revamping the uniforms for its cabin crew and pilots after six decades.
articles.content: “We are proud to present to the world, the all-new Air India Pilot & Cabin Crew uniforms, designed by @manishmalhotraworld Each design, through its colours, style and elements, represents where w… [+162 chars]

articles.author: Shylaja Varma
articles.title: Narayana Murthy deepfake videos: AI project with Elon Musk? A fact-check - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Recently, actors Alia Bhatt, Rashmika Mandanna, Katrina Kaif and Kajol were targets of deepfakes, with morphed clips of theirs doing the rounds on the internet. Narayana Murthy had spoked about the dangers of deepfake recently.
articles.content: Two deepfake videos of Infosys founder NR Narayana Murthy purportedly promoting a so-called investing platform Quantum AI are being shared on social media amid the rising issue of deepfake technology… [+2357 chars]

articles.author: ET EnergyWorld
articles.title: India's solar power capacity hits 72.02 GW, govt advances solar park projects - ETEnergyWorld
articles.description: State-wise data showed an increase in solar power capacity since 2019-20, with substantial contributions from Gujarat, Karnataka, and Rajasthan. The installations are largely driven by private sector investments, selected through a transparent bidding process.
